title: when are you gonna fix this bug in the forums?
body:
I posted a while ago about a bug in these forums, where (in my experience) if you comment on someones thread and go back and try to edit it before posting, it will make you go back to the end after every character added or deleted. pls fix asap, its really annoying, especially when you have a big chunk you want to add.

btw the bug does not apply with starting threads, only commenting on them.

replies.body:
Hi,

Can you let us know which operating system and which browsers you are using when you experience this. Is it when you write any new comment, just when you edit your comments or both?
its both when I try to write a comment them I click a different area of the comment then press backspace it then brings me back to the latest word I wrote
just checked the operating system it says windows 7 professional

we only have Internet Explorer 11, it does do the same thing with new comments and editing as well. I will have to get back to you on the operating system in a little while.  it is either windows 7 or 8.

Same issue for me. in fact I decided not to post instead of editing as it was too annoying to go back.
I use Windows 7 Ultimate service pack 1, IE 10.
